# Speech Audiometry Electron + React Project

## Project Overview
Cross-platform desktop application for speech audiometry scoring using Electron and React.

## Development Status
- [x] Created copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffolded Electron + React project structure
- [x] Created React components for audiometry functionality
- [x] Implemented audio playback logic
- [x] Installed dependencies
- [x] Created build and run tasks
- [x] Completed documentation

## Project Structure
- React frontend for UI components
- Electron backend for desktop app packaging
- Audio playback using Web Audio API
- Block-based sentence presentation (3, 4, 5, 6, 7 sentences)
- Support for Form A and Form B scoring
